CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( TEXT(RBAC_Department__c) = 'AccountDev', OR( TEXT(Job_Function__c) = 'PipelineExcellence', TEXT(Job_Function__c) = 'RecruitingOps', TEXT(Job_Function__c) = 'ADPrograms' )), TEXT(RBAC_Department__c) & "-" & TEXT(Job_Function__c) & "-" & CASE( TEXT(Role_Level__c), "SeniorDirector", "Director", "SeniorManager", "Manager", TEXT(Role_Level__c) ), IF( OR( TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'IC', TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'TL', TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'Intern', TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'Contractor' ), TEXT(RBAC_Department__c) & "-" & TEXT(Sales_Country__c) & "-" & TEXT(Sales_Segment__c) & "-" & TEXT(Sales_Sector__c) & "-" & TEXT(Job_Function__c) & "-" & CASE( TEXT(Role_Level__c), "SeniorDirector", "Director", "SeniorManager", "Manager", TEXT(Role_Level__c) ),
IF( OR( TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'Manager', TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'SeniorManager', TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'Director', TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'SeniorDirector' ), TEXT(RBAC_Department__c) & "-" & TEXT(Sales_Region__c) & "-" & CASE( TEXT(Sales_Segment_Parent__c), "ENT+", "ENT", TEXT(Sales_Segment_Parent__c) ) & "-" & TEXT(Job_Function__c) & "-" & CASE( TEXT(Role_Level__c), "SeniorDirector", "Director", "SeniorManager", "Manager", TEXT(Role_Level__c) ),
IF( OR( TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'AVP', TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'VP', TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'SVP' ), TEXT(RBAC_Department__c) & "-" & TEXT(Sales_Region__c) & "-" & TEXT(Job_Function__c) & "-" & CASE( TEXT(Role_Level__c), "SeniorDirector", "Director", "SeniorManager", "Manager", TEXT(Role_Level__c) ),
IF( OR( TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'EVP', TEXT(Role_Level__c) = 'CRO' ), TEXT(RBAC_Department__c) & "-" & TEXT(Job_Function__c) & "-" & CASE( TEXT(Role_Level__c), "SeniorDirector", "Director", "SeniorManager", "Manager", TEXT(Role_Level__c) ), "Invalid Template" ) ) ) )
)
CustomField.label: RBAC Test Formula
